English:
Hah! You stand at a disadvantage now!
I will return this debt to you without fail!
Chinese:
呿！看來現在的形勢不利……
這個仇，我一定會報！
Korean:
큭…! 지금은 불리한가…!
이 빚은 반드시 갚아주마!
German:
Ha! Du schlägst dich auf die Verliererseite!
Das werde ich dir garantiert heimzahlen!

English:
As you wish.
My mind is made up on this matter.
Chinese:
正合我意。
我已做好覺悟……
Korean:
바라는 바입니다
그 정도의 결의는 했으니까요…
German:
Wie du willst.
Ich habe mich entschieden.

English:
Thanks, Magnamon! I can't tell you how happy I am
to have a friend I can count on as much as you!
Chinese:
謝謝你，金甲龍獸！
能得到這麼可靠的伙伴，我超～感動的！
Korean:
고마워 매그너몬!
굉장히 믿음직스러운 동료가 생겨서, 나 초~ 감격이야!
German:
Danke, Magnamon! Ach, was bin ich froh, einen
Freund zu haben, auf den ich mich so verlassen
kann!

English:
It is I who should thank you. You gave me the
opportunity, and I will always be your ally.
Chinese:
我才要道謝……謝謝你們給了我機會，
今後我永遠會是人類的伙伴。
Korean:
저야말로 감사합니다 …계기를 주셔서
앞으로 저는, 계속 인간의 편입니다
German:
Ich habe dir zu danken. Du hast mir eine Chance
gewährt. Ich werde immer dein Verbündeter sein.

English: Call me whenever you need me.
Chinese: 如果有事的話，歡迎隨時召喚我。
Korean: 무슨 일이 생기면, 언제든 불러 주세요
German: Ruf mich, wann immer du mich brauchst.

English:
Oh yes. As a sign of my cooperation,
I shall offer you this.
Chinese:
對了，
這個給你，當作協力的證明。
German:
Ach ja. Und als Zeichen meines Beistandes gebe
ich dir das hier.

English:
Magnamon of the Royal Knights is now an ally.
Better go report this to the agency.
Chinese:
皇家騎士的成員――金甲龍獸成為了伙伴。
暫且先回事務所報告吧。
Korean:
로얄 나이츠의 일원, 매그너몬이 동료가 되었다
일단, 사무소로 돌아가서 보고하자
German:
Magnamon von den Royal Knights ist jetzt ein
Verbündeter. Das melde ich lieber im Büro.
